speaker: Help Desk
message: hi there, how can i help

speaker: Help Desk
message: you will have to cite the source

speaker: Help Desk
message: It should be in your reference list

speaker: Help Desk
message: sorry are you referring to labeling the appendix?

speaker: Help Desk
message: https://owl.purdue.edu/owl/research_and_citation/apa_style/apa_formatting_and_style_guide/footnotes_appendices.html

speaker: Help Desk
message: try referring to the sample paper here to see examples of an appendix

speaker: Help Desk
message: you do still need to indicate the source of your appendix in your references

speaker: Help Desk
message: if you see the sample paper, in the appendix there is a reference to libero justo and in the references the source is referenced there as well

speaker: Help Desk
message: Is this for WR? Do you know which librarian you are paired with? you may want to consult them further

speaker: Help Desk
message: yup should be alright as long as the figure or table is labeled and the source is referenced in your main reference list

speaker: Help Desk
message: no problem
